episodes.title: #353 - Doomsday Cult Leader: Children of God, Sexual Evangelism & Having 17 Kids | Ray Connolly
episodes.description: Ray Connolly is a former leading member of "The Children of God", one of the most radical group of Jesus Freaks spawned during the sixties. They later morphed into a headline grabbing cult known as "The Family" known for strange mixture of evangelism, doomsday prophecies and unusual sexual practices taught by their founder, David Berg. episodes.title: #302 - Cult Investigator: Satanic Rituals, Scientology & Israel-Palestine | Lawrence Wright
episodes.description: Lawrence Wright is the Pulitzer Prize-winning author of multiple books including "Going Clear: Scientology, Hollywood & the Prison of Belief", and "The Looming Tower: Al-Qaeda and the Road to 9/11". His newest book "The Human Scale" tells a story of an Israeli cop and a Palestinian-American FBI agent who join forces to solve the murder of an Israeli police chief in the West Bank. episodes.title: Cult Deprogrammer Explains How to Un-Brainwash Cult Victims | Rick Ross
episodes.description:
Rick Alan Ross is a cult deprogrammer who has been helping people escape cults since 1982. He recently appeared on HBO's "The Vow", which examined NXIVM, a self-help organization-turned-sex cult. Rick has intervened in more than 500 deprogramming cases in various countries. His book is called “Cults Inside Out” which demonstrates many of the tactics the groups use for control and manipulation - and, more importantly, some of the most effective methods he and other experts have used to reverse that programming.
https://culteducation.com
https://twitter.com/RickAlanRoss

episodes.title: The Making Of David Miscavige | Ron Miscavige | KONCRETE Podcast #74
episodes.description:
Ron Miscavige is the father of David Miscavige who is the leader of the church of scientology.  Ron and his family joined Scientology in 1970, and he worked for the Sea Org for almost 27 years.  It's also worth mentioning Ron signed a Billion year contract with the church.  This is really a tragic story of how a father became disconnected from his son, and then you throw in the whole scientology aspect of it and how the family originally got into this mess which eventually led to a broken bond between father and son. 
https://www.therealronmiscavige.com

episodes.title: #49 - The #1 Threat to Scientology | Mike Rinder
episodes.description: Mike Rinder is a former senior executive of the Church of Scientology International (CSI) and the Sea Organization based in the United States. From 1982 to 2007 Mike served on the board of directors of CSI and also held the post of executive director of its Office of Special Affairs, overseeing the corporate, legal and public relations matters of Scientology at the international level. Rinder left Scientology in 2007. From 2016 to 2019, he co-hosted the A&E documentary series Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
